reviewText: It's a wonderful story, very well done, and gives us insight as to what it was like back then.  My husband and I watch it every Christmas Eve .We have two homes and have a copy of it at each one so we can watch it wherever we are at Christmas.

Bought for annual Christmas viewing, this movie exceeded all of my expectations.  For a change, I wanted a Christmas movie about Jesus and found this -- what a breath of fresh air!  I highly recommend this to anyone who wants to learn about the true meaning of Christmas, as it has become a new Christmas tradition for my wife and me.
I feel I have a deeper understanding of the times that brought Jesus.
Arrived in great shape one of the best movies to see.
GREAT MOVIE ABOUT OUR SAVIOR JESUS CHRIST

The movie opened my eyes to what life was like under Roman rule in Israel when Christ was born. Very scriptural with Bibical accuracy except the Kings from afar visited Christ 2 years later, not at the stable. Their visit added more to the story.
Loved it. Great to share during the holidays.
